website_summaries.verdict: The GPS model of the very latest smartwatch release by Apple.
pros: The large screen is always on - no more shaking to wake up
Tracks heart rate, environmental noise levels, and menstrual cycles
Motivates you to exercise with prompts
cons: Complaints of poor battery life and fragility

customer_reviews.title: FAKE???
customer_reviews.text: I’m thinking that mine might be fake. It is a darker pink than my daughters Apple Watch 4, and it is definitely a darker pink color and not the champagne gold which is supposed to be between gold and rose gold. This is my first Apple Watch and it seems to function ok. But I’m considering buying one direct from Apple and comparing the colors. In the picture I’m holding actual rose gold jewelry next to it and it seems even darker pink. THOUGHTS???
customer_reviews.author: Tybee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: 7 Hours... I had this watch for 7 hours and the rear glass is already cracked. It fell not even 2 feet removing it from my wrist. Landed on the backside and cracked the rear sensor. Absolutely ridiculous. Poor quality if it can't withstand something this minor of a bump.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Switch the band!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% bad because of the crap band. I read a review on here about it and just thought someone was complaining about something stupid. It is true. Band is not secure when wearing on a normal day. Mine fell off with out me knowing and is gone a week after wearing it. First time out of the house. I got for medical issues. I loved it. Felt secure that if I fell it would call emergency services, took heart rate. Able to see schedule on my wrist. I’m out all the money!!!!!!. Switch the band immediately!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actual Apple Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I looked for this at my local stores (target, Verizon, Walmart) and all were sold out! So I bought on here and I was super nervous it wasn’t the real deal, or it was refurbished but no! It’s the real thing sold by Apple and it’s beautiful! I had the 3, but I’m spoiled and wanted the 5 🤣 I don’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Mara Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Waited a few days before writing this review ... must confess I really do love this watch it’s soo useful as a business owner and wife who has a very active lifestyle, this watch assists me soo well. Absolutely no complaints, I saw a few persons complaining about the battery life and to be honest it doesn’t affect me at all. I simply put it to charge while I let my iPhone 11 pro max change each night and it lasts me alll day . I’m so happy with my purchase, thank you ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: On the order it said, may have some minor scratches. But came brand new and looks perfect. In the Amazon box there was the charger, both M and S size bands. The only thing is that it didn’t come with the Apple box. But for the price it’s completely worth it. I charge it to full capacity and updates the iOS to 6.1.3. So far everything looks good for a ***** Not sure about the battery life yet so I’m give a ****
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I had the series 3 and loved it, but wanted an upgrade. The screen is so much bigger!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the sleep tracking yet, but everything else is great so far!! I just received this watch 3 days ago, as a birthday gift, with gift card money from my birthday....The call quality is excellent...the instructions say the phone needs to be near you, but I left it in the living room, and it rang while i was in the bathroom across my apt. I was able to hear the caller perfectly!!..Also, I am in a wheelchair, and i love that it tracks pushing movement!!...I'm now getting much more exercise!!...This watch is well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Murray

customer_reviews.title: New Apple fan
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Apple Watch and I love it. Wish I could install Instagram but besides that it accommodates what is expected from a smart watch. I also like how the screen has a good calibration so it responds fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful investment!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Apple Watch and I am in love! My Fitbit was too bulky for taking care and laying down babies (my job) so took the plunge with this! My son is 20 and has an older version and was jealous 😎 love that I can take calls (or not lol) this is such a luxury device! Won’t go back to Fitbit no way no how.
customer_reviews.author: Korney and Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Be aware. This watch is Bluetooth only and can’t be connected cellular. I didn’t know the difference but I do now. If you want the watch that you can connect cellular it will say “gps+cellular “ upfront. And it is much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but very cool features. Heart rate monitor works great, the sleep monitor all is really cool. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Rose/blush gold not gold! (Apple says gold but they don’t make it for 5)
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome. However, Apple is HIGHLY misleading with the colors! Even on their official site they call the aluminum case “gold aluminum”... it’s 100% NOT gold or champagne gold. It’s 100% blush gold or rose gold, yet Apple decided not to be accurate in its marketing of this product. The stainless steel gold looks like chrome and is not brushed, and is darker than a champagne gold as I usually like. So, if you like lighter golds, this one, albeit rose gold, is more feminine and lighter than the steel. I also bought a gold mesh band that tricks the eye into thinking the watch case isn’t so blush gold.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life
customer_reviews.text: I’m still trying to learn all it has to offer , I’m disappointed with the battery life. I have to charge it every night. I wish I knew before that I could have gotten a larger screen, it would have been easier to read, my fit bit Versa was a lot easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Love this !
customer_reviews.text: I was happy when I found this slightly cheaper on Amazon then at the Apple store. It does not have sleep tracking. However the guy at the Apple store said they’re is supposed to be an update this fall to add it to the watch. I have had 2 different FitBit watches and the Apple Watch seems to be more accurate with its tracking. I can not speak of the cellular abilities because I have Spectrum Mobile and they do not support the Apple Watch so I did not purchase the cellular version.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Used? Looks brand new!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about my Apple Watch. I upgraded from the series one. The battery life is INCREDIBLE. Including it being used for two workouts each day. It’s been great! Waterproof meant so much to me with a toddler too. The GPS Does a great job tracking as well. Super happy with my “used” purchase. No scratches or anything. Couldn’t even tell it wasn’t brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia

customer_reviews.title: my first Apple Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, it combines my WW, steps expertise etc. Also has a fall detection on it, which with the mobility live it was $50. per month. Has several things in it, I'm still exploring it. I would recomend it to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda rosa

customer_reviews.title: So many functions...love it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect to like the Apple Watch given how big it is (as I always wear small, low profile Movado watches). Boy, was I wrong! It’s big, but somehow a woman who consistently beats up her watches (dings, scratches, etc.) has managed to wear this one for months with no issues. I now can’t live without it. I love the ability to take calls from my watch, to set up my custom watch face, to get alerts on it, and especially the activity tracking/alerts. I also got used to charging it every night in one or two days flat. Get the watch...you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: AkITgal

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a smart watch just get it.
customer_reviews.text: I have use a lot of smartwatches and this by far is my favorite. bought one for myself and the wife, Love it. I am and engineer and wife's a nurse, we also do backpacking, hiking and camping. So far these watch has provide so much useful tools and stood the brutal beatings that we put it through.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: No sleep tracking, ok battery
customer_reviews.text: I really like the aesthetics of the Apple Watch, and it works great with my iPhone and air pods. The battery is significantly improved from the previous couple generations; I can sometimes go a day and a half without needing to charge it. One flaw with this watch is its lack Of sleep tracking. You have to download this third party software to track your sleep. If Apple made a watch that had a 3+ day battery life and automatic sleep tracking, this would be full stars.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for tracking heart rate
customer_reviews.text: I love the accuracy of the heart rate monitor on this watch compared to the FitBit - it checks more continuously and more accurately. I just wish the app it comes with on the iPhone had the same easy-to-read format as my old FitBit. I may need to download cardiogram or something. This watch (like others) causes a little burn/blister on my wrist and I have to take it off for a few days to get it to go away. Otherwise, a great investment for someone like me with heart rate issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied but not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Prior to buying this I had a cheap $30 fitness tracker. Honestly the Apple Watch hardly gives me additional features other than being able to reply to messages. It has a short battery life (12 hours on a good day) so I have to charge it over night and therefore don’t get sleep tracking data. Also, it’s not that great at recognizing when I’ve began vs. ended a workout. Sometimes it’ll ask me if my work out is done just cuz my heart rate is lower or ask me if I want to start a workout when I’m busy at work. Nonetheless, it looks cool and seems pretty accurate in terms of fitness tracking.
customer_reviews.author: Romey Youniss

customer_reviews.title: Awful battery life - otherwise cool features
customer_reviews.text: This is a really hard review because I believe the product is wonderful! It’s awesome for responding to phone calls, messaging and being able to reply, the workouts you can monitor, being able to “Ding” your iPhone and fine it. The BIGGEST gripe i have is the battery life. 18 hour battery life is just awful. Yeah, the Apple Watch features are nice but how stupid that your constantly having to deal with a dying battery. What’s the point. It’s really unfortunate. Some reviews ive read on the product said you can get rid of heart rate or other things to help save battery, but those are features you would want?!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Confeld

customer_reviews.title: love the new features
customer_reviews.text: I had the apple series 1 for several years until the battery wore out and my daughter wore it to school and popped the face off. I knew it was time for a new one! I love the new features on the face designs, the size is a little bigger and the battery is so much better. I am still getting used to all it does, but it is definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter adores it.
customer_reviews.text: Present to 15 year Granddaughter. She loves it: showed me all the functions but, that’s above me. I bought a 2015 AMG- never mastered the High Teck! Went and exchanged it for a 2006 SL65- my level of Teck. Do you understand?
customer_reviews.author: Brunno

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It keeps me motivated. I like being able to compete against others. The battery life is great. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: So happy I made the purchase
customer_reviews.text: After 21/2 years my Fitbit Blaze was not charging as well. The only thing fitbit customer service would do for me was give me a discount on a new Versa. I decided to put the $100 towards this Apple Watch. I've had it now for 2 days and I'm loving it. I also scheduled to attend a class at the Apple store so I can learn even more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve, the First Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a gift. Unfortunately I bought it at Apple! A friend said, “You should’ve bought it on Amazon.” Wish I had run into her PRIOR to the Apple purchase. I could’ve saved quite a bit of money! So I decided to one from Amazon, FOR ME! I saved money and it felt good doing it! By the way, LOVE the Watch!
customer_reviews.author: Kfysman

customer_reviews.title: Love this Apple watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have all Apple devices. This watch was so easy to set up and use. I bought it mainly to track fitness. Love the "get up and move" notice and the breathe notice. I get emails and text messages. And current weather . The watch face is bright and easy to read. I will never wear a regular "time only" watch again. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the battery life. It must be charged every day. It’s hard to track sleep quality when it’s on the charger. It did not come with any instructions on usage.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Primm

customer_reviews.title: You can not connect it to your phone service. Only your phone w bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: You have to charge it every day. For some reason the watch face you pick reverts back to the original watch face often. I don’t know if it’s when it runs out of battery or gets out of range of your phone. Battery only lasts a day. Good part is you can talk on your watch on speaker in the car. Good to keep you from a ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Prier

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT 🥰
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good quality and not FAKE. I like the design and the color. Till now i have no problem with it it happen one time the volume didn’t work but it happened with my old apple watch too. I was so happy to save $100 on this awesome watch cause i broke my old one and was trying to save money to get a new one but thank you so much for this deal 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Dina Hamed

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: Highly satisfied. New to Apple and love my new series 5 watch as well as my iPhone 11. Should have been switched from android to Apple
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love my Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: I had the first generation watch and upgraded to this one. It works great. I can get almost 24 hours of battery life with this one. I like the added feature of turning on the waterproof function. I haven’t explored all of the things I can do with this watch but so far I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Harmon

customer_reviews.title: overhyped
customer_reviews.text: Apple usually creates good hardware. While this version of the Apple Watch seems pretty good it doesn't improve much upon the Series 4. Always on may be interesting but not for the loss of battery life. If you want an Apple Watch it's a much better deal to get the Series 4 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Consumerist

customer_reviews.title: Defective Item
customer_reviews.text: The battery is less than a quarter after charging for 24 hrs. I checked the charging cord and nothing’s wrong with it. I get the charging sign leaving the watch on top of it but it does not charge. I purchased the item month ago.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby bought this for me for my birthday & I love it! Very nice to be able to have my “phone” with me when I can’t actually have my IPhone with me at work. One of my favorite things is using my Starbucks app!
customer_reviews.author: Trina V.

customer_reviews.title: Heart rate tracking is better
customer_reviews.text: Love this one over the 3. The heart rate is much better
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Not a big difference for me.
customer_reviews.text: It’s much faster than my series 1. But the battery seems almost the same. I still need to charge it every night. It is not a big difference for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: It’s like wearing your phone on your wrist.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazing...I’m STILL learning new things it can do to make my life easier. I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Paula L Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Apple Watch S5
customer_reviews.text: This is my first apple watch and it's beautiful. I took this photo the second day I had it. I also have a protective case on it and I recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I was slightly concerned but I received my package as scheduled which was two days delivery, this is an Apple Watch from the company, sealed in the box. There was a review with concern that this was a knock off and mine is not, it’s a genuine product. So far the watch is great. I needed it for a new job because I cannot have my phone out at all and need to make sure the kiddo is picked up and okay while I’m working.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart watch in the market
customer_reviews.text: I love the new version,its an awesome upgrade from watch series 3,the always on display can be turned off which gives you additional juice.it also helps me to maintain a health fitness data. An all round smart watch
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Saifullah Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my watch. I had debated for a while about getting one and I’m so glad I did! I use mine throughout the day to keep track of being active, text messages, alerts and notifications, and to remember to stop and do a breathing exercise when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Combs

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch with nice features but it has bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Won't hold clock face. One time this absurdly large letters appeared on the face of the watch. One letter or number filled the whole clock face. It wouldn't reset and I couldn't even turn the watch off and restart it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hostetter

customer_reviews.title: Lots of functionality, but battery life is a deal breaker
customer_reviews.text: Yes, lots of functionality, as we're used from Apple. However, can you really use all? Mostly not because of the 18-24hrs battery life. It'd be interesting to see the sleep tracking functionality but impossible to use as you need to leave charging every night. And the bezel is just hideous. The minimalistic look is not for a watch.
customer_reviews.author: P. Ibanez

customer_reviews.title: wish it lasted 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, still learning all its functions. My other fitness tracker battery lasted 4-5 days this one is only one, but it has a lot more neat functions than my old one.. I think I will choose a different band color as well as the pink/rose one absorbs the newspaper ink and its hard to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: tina sorci

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smart watch that had a constant on face with a second hand and this one had that function. I really like it. It does not cut into my wrist like my previous Fitbit did. I like that I can respond to text messages on the watch, allowing me to not have my phone out at work.
customer_reviews.author: shawn brown

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't support iPhone with software lower than iOS 13... huge disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this watch until I opened it and the watch face was rose gold. Misleading advertising, the post said gold. I am not loving it as I had hoped and really do not want to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: LuEaston

customer_reviews.title: Take off the Chinese written what the heck what’s the meaning of Apple 🍎
customer_reviews.text: I got sooo discouraged because they all written in Chinese and the only thing, I can read in English said Apple Watch why is Chinese Written sooo discouraging sad 😢 I think 🤔 I’m going to returned this doesn’t NOT Inspiring me. Sad 😔
customer_reviews.author: Nimfa pfaff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👌
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch Came beautifully packaged in real certified and sealed Apple packaging. This is first rodeo with Apple and will not be my last!! I appreciate the sale price!! It’s the same exact watch on Apple website just $100 cheaper! Why not?! Thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Christin Cipolla

customer_reviews.title: I do love buying from Amazon and would definitely give them a 5 Star rating ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️  ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: The watch was perfect but it is compatible with 6 but not my 6 which i did not see stated in descriptions and was so disappointed after trying to pair it over and over again until my daughter looked it up and said, mom, wrong watch. Now I’ve returned the watch but the credit did not go back on my Amazon credit card but onto a gift card. Would sincerely appreciate if Amazon could fix this please.
customer_reviews.author: Gweneth

customer_reviews.title: I love my Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Apple Watch. It is easy to use and I love that it will ask me if I want to track my activity when I forget to start it. It's fun to be able to talk into the phone for a call whe I can't find my phone. I love that I can change the band to go with my outfits or just to have fun. This has been the one watch that I love to wear all the time. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for a women
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the watch and the band . I really enjoy using the different watch faces and complications. So many choices. I have even started using the activity face. Enjoying my first Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Tex1911

customer_reviews.title: Love my Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I feel naked without my Apple Watch. This one replaced my 1st one I owned and I’m happy with it. I still can’t figure out how to use the sleep app tho
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Saiter

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this watch, but the battery life sucks. I don’t mind though, I just charge it every night. Therefore, for sleep tracking it can’t be so accurate. I love the workout feature where I can share with a friend. It helps hold us accountable! I love the style and so much more!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Typical nice apple product
customer_reviews.text: Watch came new and boxed with everything. Shipping took a little longer than usual. But my wife loves her new watch. Would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Griesshaber

customer_reviews.title: Can swim with it  To do laps in pool
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch Better than last one I am able to swim laps with it Records distance great watch doesn’t always know what stroke I do but close enough
customer_reviews.author: Audry V.

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: I’m hooked I love it I’m obsessed. I love flooding my rings and getting texts to my watch. It works great. Best present I’ve ever given myself
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: My wife had the Series 0, I have the 3. I got this as a gift for her and im jealous. The always on, additional widgets/complications, fall and heart detection, great!
customer_reviews.author: blind_skwirl

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It’s too complicated. I'm slowly figuring it out, but it doesn't need to be this complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch!
customer_reviews.text: Does not track my sleep. I heard with the iOS 7 it will be added! Love the color I chose and got a great deal when they offered it! I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!! This is the real deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical from reading some reviews but this is 100% legitimate. Arrived in the Apple box and everything. Brand new!! Amazing quality and battery life!! 100% would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra G

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Apple watch seems to be a well made watch that pairs with your Iphone. Besides telling time and tracking exercise, there are lots of apps.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Charge it every day!
customer_reviews.text: If I can get my wife to remember to wear it , then I will know more about it!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I will not list all the pros that everyone mentioned. only drawback is the watch band makes my skin redness and itchy. the watch itself have no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: LULU

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this watch more than I thought I would. I've had Fitbits for years, but lately they just don't work that well with iphones. Decided I'd had enough and bought the 5. I did add the Sleep Watch app since the 5 didn't track what I wanted....no worries there. Lots of specific workouts can be tracked which is important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Fleming

customer_reviews.title: I am in love 😍 with my new watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an Apple Watch 3 after I shattered the screen. I went back and forth for a week trying to decide what to get. I believe it said this was a renewed product, but it came in the original packaging, with no scratches or flaws. It looks brand new. I am IN LOVE 😍 with this watch!! So grateful I decided to pay a little more for the 5 over the 3 or 4.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch is a good product and I’m loving mine
customer_reviews.text: I love my Apple Watch 5 it’s easy to setup keeps me on track with my exercises and much more I don’t have to carry my phone with me all the time I do wish the battery life was longer, but really can’t complain about it since I don’t sleep with it on
customer_reviews.author: kaye pyles

customer_reviews.title: The latest version at a bargain cost
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and reasonable cost for this Apple series 5 watch, a greatly appreciated present for my wife, who is thrilled .
customer_reviews.author: George P Walker, III, MD

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far my GF loves this. Nothing to complain about at the moment. Very weather proof and stands strong against the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Branson C.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet watch
customer_reviews.text: Best watch I seen so far even has a hidden camera on the bottom of the watch (would be cool if they add one to the top of watch )
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Must have for busy people
customer_reviews.text: I love my Apple Watch and its cheaper on amazon than from apple. I track everything on it and its waterproof! I wear it surfing and it tracks my calories! I also use it swimming laps in the pool and working out. Its so convenient and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Loving my Apple 5 Series with GPS and Data
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Auto Sleep app. The App does not show a TRUE depiction of my sleep habits. Laying in bed, for instance, shows as Sleep instead of resting. I wore a FITBIT for years and it aligns more closely with my sleep patterns.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Belle

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: little sketchy for the price since it was the lowest i found but came how it was listed. perfect and brand new thanks!
customer_reviews.author: long

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable band I've never worn.This is the most comfortable band I've never worn
customer_reviews.author: Sonyamk

customer_reviews.title: No watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything came in the box, BUT THE WATCH. There was nothing in the space that the watch was to be sitting in. It was on Christmas morning. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Jaelyn Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Apple does it again
customer_reviews.text: Apple is amazing. I love their presentation of packaging and the quality of their devices. Easy to set up and get going. Lots of fun customizable faces. Clean and intuitive design and display. My loves this thing, and it was the best Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great smart watch, worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wear it everyday and charge most nights. I’m only down to 50% battery or so by the time I go to sleep. Sometimes I charge it for an hour in the evening if I want to use it for sleep tracking. Works really well.
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Love this product..
customer_reviews.text: I now do not have to take my phone when walking. Love the way it keeps up with my exercise and I now have the apps I need with me all the time if I can not take my phone. We also ordered more watch straps.
customer_reviews.author: Judy P. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Best smart watch on market
customer_reviews.text: I have used apple watch, galaxy and Huawei watch. Still, I love apple watch most. Most due to the software. Battery life still is a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very satesfied so far
customer_reviews.text: It is a great smart watch with all my desired features. After using a few other brands and previous apple watch models, I can confidently say that it is the best smart watch I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. This is my first one. I do wish that it let you create your own watch faces instead of just configuring the one sit comes preloaded with. And I wish it had its own sleep tracking tool. The ones I’ve downloaded are terrible. But otherwise it’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: R. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Love the upgrade... coming from a 1 series. This is a much faster more clearer watch. A must upgrade if you have a 1 series!!
customer_reviews.author: Candyamm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: IN PERFECT CONDITION AND ITS SUCH AN AMAZING WATCH! DEFINITELY RECOMMENDED THE SERIES 5 OVER THE SERIES 3... WITH THE PRICE NO DOUBT
customer_reviews.author: Anne Gadson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love! I’ve been wanting to get an apple watch forever, so when I saw the 40mm series 5 was on sale for $299 I couldn’t pass it up. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves This
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment much about this as I don't use it, but my wife LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron A.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and highly interactive devise
customer_reviews.text: An excellent valued product that has exceeded all of my expectations. What I thought was originally a "nice to have" device, is now a "MUST have product that I use constantly.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN Shopper in VA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money and time!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has not worked correctly from the start. It doesn’t track my sleep at all. It frequently turns off for no reason battery at 86% and won’t turn on unless I put it on the charger. Has happened over and over despite efforts to fix by turning off phone and watch off, turning back on, unpairing and repairing. What a waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: first Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Apple Watch and I thought the battery would last longer than slightly over a day. But other then that I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear to bed so I don’t even know if there is sleep tracking but I have worn everyday since I bought it and I love it! I charge it every night when I go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: BillyBob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Treated myself with this purchase. The band fits great and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ZWpurchases

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Does so much more than I could’ve ever imagined a watch would do.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Arruda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS WATCH!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch my horse Kick me and Broke my eye watch three so I moved up to a five which I am very pleased with I would recommend it to anybody love love love it...,
customer_reviews.author: Jaimi Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift and so far so good. Haven’t heard any complaints! She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: Battery life should be longer for price
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the battery life. It went to 10% alittle before my 8 hour shift was over with. I had to put it on charge when I got home. Yes I cleared me apps so nothing was still using battery life. I have been wanting an Apple Watch since I got an iPhone... and I love all features but battery life should last longer especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: erika blacker

customer_reviews.title: I need to buy warranty
customer_reviews.text: Love it but forgot to get the warranty with it. Is it too late to buy the warranty
customer_reviews.author: flash

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to anyone looking for a new watch or just as an upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: StevenA.long

customer_reviews.title: Good but....
customer_reviews.text: Great product wish I got a little more for my money maybe some freebies since the price point is high for this product a few extras would be awesome..........I think I got an apple sticker out of it 😕
customer_reviews.author: BjR D6

product_meta.title: Apple Watch Series 5 (GPS, 40mm) - Gold Aluminum Case with Pink Sport Band
